info.name: 140+ Background Colors for WorkFlowy Lists
info.description:
INSTRUCTIONS IN THIS BLOG POST (Tampermonkey script and shared WorkFlowy list needed): 
https://blog.workflowy.com/2017/08/08/140-background-colors/
- 140+ list background colors with all of the CSS color names
- Add to it with additional Hexadecimal color codes

data.title: The style seems to stop working after Tampermonkey 4.7 update
Blinking so much on mouse-over, kinda bugging me.
